subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Tia Norfleet has long portrayed herself as an accomplished driver, but the discrepancy between her true record and her public comments has drawn objections from racing officials.
snippet: Tia Norfleet has long portrayed herself as an accomplished driver, but the discrepancy between her true record and her public comments has drawn objections from racing officials.
